TopicTitle: Exception is spamming console, unable to find the cause of an error I have.

Articles.Content: The exception is the "MapView.Mapisenabled not found" exception, and the audio randomly cuts out until you restart the game twice. What is doing this??

You need to attach the fill output_log so we can see what is causing that error. See the sticky at the top if your not sure where to grab it.

If you are running any mods not updated to 1.2, one of those is probably the cause.
